name: Cosmic Sorcery
description: I first met Joy at a comic convention in Portland. She had hired me to photograph her Bulma Bunny cosplay. Ever since then she’s been hiring me to photograph other cosplays, and the result is usually spectacular. I saw a Doctor Strange cosplay she put together and showed off on social media. I loved it so much that I wanted to photograph her in it, so I invited her to the studio for a fun photo session. For this particular shot, I wanted to emulate a style that Lindsay Adler frequently uses, casting shapes onto her subjects using light. I made a triangle set in foam board and pointed a light through it to create the shape, and it really helped bring out the cosmic, mystical nature of the character.
